00052 // Uncomment this to use Boost.Move, which can improve the speed when using
00053 // extremely large numbers. Note that using options::copy_on_write gives a much
00054 // more noticeable speed improvement.
00055 //#define BOOST_XINT_USE_MOVE
00056 
00057 // Copy-on-Write is always used internally, unless this is defined.
00058 //#define BOOST_XINT_DISABLE_COW
00059 
00060 
00061 
00062 #ifdef BOOST_XINT_DISABLE_COW
00063     #undef BOOST_XINT_USE_COW
00064 #else
00065     #define BOOST_XINT_USE_COW
00066 #endif
00067 
00068 #ifdef BOOST_XINT_USE_MOVE
00069     #include <boost/move/move.hpp>
00070     #define BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) BOOST_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type)
00071     #define BOOST_XINT_COPYABLE_AND_MOVABLE(type) BOOST_COPYABLE_AND_MOVABLE(type)
00072     #define BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) BOOST_RV_REF(type)
00073     #define BOOST_XINT_MOVE(value) boost::move(value)
00074     #define BOOST_XINT_FORWARD(type, value) boost::forward<type>(value)
00075 #else
00076     template <typename T> class disable_boost_rv_ref: public T { };
00077     #define BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) const type&
00078     #define BOOST_XINT_COPYABLE_AND_MOVABLE(type)
00079     #define BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) disable_boost_rv_ref<type>
00080     #define BOOST_XINT_MOVE(value) value
00081     #define BOOST_XINT_FORWARD(type, value) value
00082 #endif

00120 template <class T>
00121 class base_divide_t {
00122     public:
00123     base_divide_t() { }
00124     base_divide_t(T q, T r): quotient(q), remainder(r) { }
00125     base_divide_t(const base_divide_t<T> &copy):
00126         quotient(copy.quotient), remainder(copy.remainder) { }
00127     base_divide_t(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(base_divide_t) move) {
00128         quotient._swap(move.quotient); remainder._swap(move.remainder); }
00129 
00130     base_divide_t& operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(base_divide_t) copy)
00131         { quotient = copy.quotient; remainder = copy.remainder; return *this; }
00132     base_divide_t& operator=(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(base_divide_t) move) {
00133         using std::swap;
00134         swap(quotient, move.quotient);
00135         swap(remainder, move.remainder);
00136         return *this; }
00137 
00138     T quotient, remainder;
00139 
00140     private:
00141     BOOST_XINT_COPYABLE_AND_MOVABLE(base_divide_t)
00142 };

00151 typedef boost::uintmax_t doubledigit_t;
00152 
00159 typedef boost::uint_t<std::numeric_limits<doubledigit_t>::digits / 2>::fast
00160     digit_t;
00161 
00163 template <typename T = void>
00164 struct exception_handler {
00165     template <typename E>
00166     static void call(const char *file, std::size_t line, const E &e) {
00167         #ifdef BOOST_XINT_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00168             if (fn) fn(file, line, e);
00169             abort();
00170         #else
00171             if (fn) fn(file, line, e);
00172             throw e;
00173         #endif
00174     }
00175 
00176     static on_exception_t fn;
00177 };
00178 template <typename T> on_exception_t exception_handler<T>::fn;
00179 
00182 const std::size_t        minimum_digits    = 1;
00183 const std::size_t        bits_per_digit    =
00184     std::numeric_limits<digit_t>::digits;
00185 const std::size_t        digits_in_uintmax =
00186     (std::numeric_limits<boost::uintmax_t>::digits + bits_per_digit - 1) /
00187     bits_per_digit;
00188 const digit_t       digit_hibit       = (digit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit-1));
00189 const doubledigit_t doubledigit_hibit = (doubledigit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit*2-1));
00190 const doubledigit_t digit_overflowbit = (doubledigit_t(1) << bits_per_digit);
00191 const digit_t       digit_mask        = digit_t(digit_overflowbit-1);
00193 
00195 
00198 struct magnitude_t {
00199     private:
00200     std::size_t copy_count;
00201 
00202     public:
00203     const bool readonly;
00204     const std::size_t max_length;
00205     digit_t digits[minimum_digits]; // Must be last data item, see "struct hack"
00206 
00207     magnitude_t(std::size_t max_len = minimum_digits, bool ro = false):
00208         copy_count(ro ? 2 : 0), readonly(ro), max_length(max_len) { }
00209     magnitude_t(std::size_t max_len, bool ro, digit_t init): copy_count(ro ? 2 :
00210         0), readonly(ro), max_length(max_len) { digits[0] = init; }
00211     std::size_t copies() const { return copy_count; }
00212 
00213     void inc() { if (!readonly) ++copy_count; }
00214     bool dec() { return (readonly ? false : (--copy_count == 0)); }
00215 
00216     private:
00217     magnitude_t& operator=(const magnitude_t&) { throw std::logic_error(
00218         "Can't use operator= on magnitude_t"); } // Here to satisfy MSVC
00219 };
00220 
00221 inline std::size_t bits_to_digits(std::size_t bits) { return (bits +
00222     bits_per_digit - 1) / bits_per_digit; }
00223
